amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, an additional $20,300,000 for aircraft procurement for the Army to increase the number of UH-60 Black Hawk helicopters to be procured in response to attrition from 2 helicopters to 4 helicopters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1434 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text as modified: CR S12500) To make available, with an offset, an additional $20,300,000 for aircraft procurement for the Army to increase the number of UH-60 Black Hawk helicopters to be procured in response to attrition from 2 helicopters to 4 helicopters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1434 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lieberman.
